title: SMC_BACKLASH_MODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_BACKLASH_MODE :
The mode of backlash compensation.

rows.Name: SMC_BL_AUTO
rows.Comment:
The direction in which the master axis moves determines the
compensation direction

rows.Name: SMC_BL_POSITIVE
rows.Comment:
Compensation in positive direction, independent of the movement
of the master axis.

rows.Name: SMC_BL_NEGATIVE
rows.Comment:
Compensation in negative direction, independent of the movement
of the master axis.
